body.name: ASUS ROG Strix B760-A Gaming WiFi 6E ATX Motherboard for Intel 13th & 12th Gen - White, PCIe 5.0, Aura Sync RGB
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 1 hr 16 mins
Or fastest pickup Thursday, February 15. Order within 1 hr 16 mins
features: Intel LGA 1700 Socket: Ready for 13th Gen Intel Core, and 12th Gen Intel Core, Pentium Gold, and Celeron Processors
Robust Power Solution: 12 + 1 power stages, ProCool power connectors, high-quality alloy chokes, and durable capacitors are all leveraged to support the latest multi-core processors
Optimized VRM Thermals: Thick heatsinks bridged to the power stages with high-conductivity thermal pads keep the solution cool during heavy workloads
High-Performance Networking: On-board Intel Wi-Fi 6E (802.11ax) and Intel 2.5G Ethernet with ASUS LANGuard
Abundant Connectivity: USB 3.2 Gen 2x2 Type-C rear I/O port, eight additional USB ports, USB 3.2 Gen 2 front-panel connector, PCIe 5.0 x16 SafeSlot, HDMI 2.1, and DisplayPort 1.4
Intelligent Control: ASUS-exclusive AI Networking and Two-Way AI Noise Cancelation to simplify setup and improve performance
DIY-Friendly Design: PCIe Slot Q-Release, M.2 Q-Latch, BIOS FlashBack button, and Q-LED
Renowned Software: Bundled 60-day AIDA64 Extreme trial subscription and intuitive UEFI BIOS dashboard with integrated MemTest86
body.description: The ASUS ROG Strix B760-A Gaming WiFi D4 white and silver scheme motherboard is designed with boosted power delivery and optimized cooling to cope with the demands of powerful 13th Generation Intel® Core™ processors. Along with Wi-Fi 6 and PCI Express® 5.0 for superfast transfer speeds and storage, ROG Strix B760-A Gaming WiFi D4 is ready to take the helm of your clean and neat white gaming gear.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.4 4.4 out of 5 stars 106 ratings 4.4 out of 5 stars

productInformation.name: Model Name
productInformation.value: ROG STRIX B760-A GAMING WIFI D4

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful motherboard for a white build
reviews.reviewText: I was really hoping this motherboard would look super good on a white build, AND MY GAWD IT DOES! I'm currently using a 12th Gen i7, rtx 3060, Corsair ddr4 rgb ram, and it runs everything so well. Keep in mind there's not enough USB headers to run 2 RGB controllers but I didn't care too much about that lol. Great price, great performance, great for your build. I'm gonna give this board a 9/10!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great motherboard that worked right out of the box. I built an all white rig and this motherboard went so well with it. Beware this is a ddr4 build so you cannot use ddr5 ram. I used an i7 13700k intel processor which the motherboard recognized immediately. After posting, there are bios updates available but with the flash button option, it's super easy to update as long as you have another device to copy the update onto a usb stick. 5/5 definitely recommend and great for beginners as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Motherboard for a budget
reviews.reviewText: I just want to start off saying that the color of this bored looks awsome its like a silver with white parts to it i like like how it includes like 3 m.2 ssd slots so makes room for a lot more memory i like how it includes a wifi antenna and a instrution manual. I hope whenever i encounter a problom that the tech support will help like unlike some componies i hope there are more boreds like this in the future i love having all white boreds for my all white builds

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For Asus ROG boards very good balance of cost and performance
reviews.reviewText: I got one of these for my son's computer to replace an Asus Prime board that got damaged. This worked so well for him, when I did a new build for my middle daughter, I decided to go with it again. these boards have been problem free, have good performance and for a ROG gaming board, the price is very good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Zero issue on my new gaming build! Love the color too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impresionante placa base para gamers de ASUS
reviews.reviewText: He estado usando la placa base ASUS ROG Strix B760-A Gaming WiFi D4 Intel B760 durante un tiempo y estoy extremadamente satisfecho con su rendimiento y características. Esta placa base está diseñada específicamente para los entusiastas de los juegos, y se nota en cada aspecto de su diseño y funcionalidad.La primera característica que destaca es su compatibilidad con procesadores Intel de última generación, lo que garantiza un rendimiento excepcional en juegos y aplicaciones intensivas. He notado una mejora significativa en la velocidad y capacidad de respuesta de mi sistema desde que la instalé.La conectividad WiFi integrada es un gran punto a favor, ya que me permite conectarme a internet de alta velocidad sin necesidad de una tarjeta WiFi adicional. Además, la placa base cuenta con una variedad de puertos USB, incluyendo USB 3.2 Gen 2, lo que facilita la conexión de periféricos de alta velocidad y dispositivos de almacenamiento externo.La calidad de construcción de ASUS es indiscutible, y la ROG Strix B760-A no es una excepción. Los componentes de alta calidad y la construcción sólida aseguran la durabilidad a largo plazo de esta placa base.En resumen, la ASUS ROG Strix B760-A Gaming WiFi D4 Intel B760 es una elección excelente para los jugadores y entusiastas de la informática. Ofrece un rendimiento excepcional, una conectividad versátil y un diseño llamativo. Si buscas llevar tu experiencia de juego al siguiente nivel, esta placa base es una inversión que vale la pena considerar.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought the product after putting everything together on PC part picker, Said a i7 13th gen would work. Went running around trying to figure out what was wrong with it buying new ram, new power bank NOTHING WORKED! Finally went to my final choice into buying another CPU, went with the intel i7 12th gen. FINALLY WORKED!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got a 3060 ti and a Ryzen 7 5800x3d in it works well and easy to overclock with

reviews.reviewTitle: Aesthetic Brilliance Meets Top Tier Performance
reviews.reviewText: The ASUS ROG Strix B760-A Gaming WiFi D4 motherboard isn't just a component; it's the heart of my dream PC build. Its striking white aesthetic is a visual delight, perfectly aligning with my setup's theme. But it's not just about looks - the performance and features are equally impressive.The cooling efficiency is remarkable, ensuring my system runs smoothly even under heavy loads. The inclusion of a quick-release PCIe slot is a game-changer, making GPU upgrades and swaps a breeze. The M.2 quick latches are another thoughtful addition, simplifying storage expansions without the hassle.The build quality of this motherboard is exceptional, offering a reassuring sense of durability and reliability. The expandability options it provides, from ample USB ports to multiple expansion slots, cater to all my current and future needs, making it a wise investment for any PC enthusiast.In summary, the ASUS ROG Strix B760-A Gaming WiFi D4 is more than a motherboard; it's a statement of quality, functionality, and aesthetic appeal. It's a cornerstone of my setup, offering everything I need and more.
PRODUCTO LLEGO MUY BIEN, RECOMENDABLE, LO ESTOY UTILIZANDO CON UN I7 12700K, Y ESTA DE MARAVILLA

Dudaba un poco en comprarla. Las comparé con otras pero sin duda volvería a comprarla, excelentes tecnologías y soporte. Había armado otras pc antes, pero esta la usé para mi primer ordenador personal. Simplemente es bonita, bastante elegante, sus detalles le hacen un plus y trae soporte para 13va gen, por el momento la seguiré usando con un i5 12600K. Me encanta!
La calidad de los materiales es muy buena siempre recomiendo comprar cosas ROG
